parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: ID of the light source whose name you want to set

parameters.name: NewName
parameters.description: Name to be given to the specified light source

title: IModelDoc2.SetLightSourceName
description: Sets the light source name used internally by the SOLIDWORKS Design software.
signature:
System.Boolean SetLightSourceName( 
   System.Int32
ID
,
   System.String
NewName
)

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: ID of the light source whose name you want to set

parameters.name: NewName
parameters.description: Name to be given to the specified light source

returns: True if the name is set successfully, false otherwise
remarks:
The light source ID ranges from 0 to
n
, where
n
= (the total number of light sources - 1). To get the total number of light sources, call
IModelDoc2::GetLightSourceCount
.
